alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 11:59AM CDT until July 08 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plantersville, or over Tombigbee State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Fulton, Verona, Tombigbee State Park, Plantersville, Evergreen, Skyline, Abney, Mooreville, Ballardsville, Dorsey, Jacinto and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
